verses.verse: "Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5892><s%> 'Assign the cities of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> of which I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you <S%H5414><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%>

that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> who kills <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> accidentally <S%H7684><s%> or unintentionally <S%H1847><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> there. <S%H4733><s%> They shall be to you for a refuge from the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood. <S%H1818><s%>

He shall flee <S%H5127><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of those cities, <S%H5892><s%> and shall stand <S%H5975><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and declare <S%H1696><s%> his cause <S%H1697><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city. <S%H5892><s%> They shall take <S%H622><s%> him into the city <S%H5892><s%> with them, <S%H5414><s%> and give him a place, <S%H4725><s%> that he may live among them. <S%H3427><s%>

If the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H5462><s%> then they shall not deliver up the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> into his hand; <S%H3027><s%> because he struck <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> unintentionally, <S%H1097><s%> and didn't <S%H8130><s%> hate him before. <S%H8543><s%>

He shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that city <S%H5892><s%> until he stands <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> for judgment, <S%H4941><s%> until the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall be in those days. <S%H3117><s%> Then the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> to his own city, <S%H5892><s%> and to his own house, <S%H1004><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> he fled from. <S%H5127><s%>'"

They set apart <S%H6942><s%> Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> in the hill country <S%H2022><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Kiriath Arba <S%H7153><s%> (the same is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>) in the hill country <S%H2022><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

Beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%> eastward, <S%H4217><s%> they assigned <S%H5414><s%> Bezer <S%H1221><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in the plain <S%H4334><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

These were the appointed <S%H4152><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for the alien <S%H1616><s%> who lives <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, <S%H5221><s%> that whoever kills any person <S%H5315><s%> unintentionally <S%H7684><s%> might flee <S%H5127><s%> there, <S%H4191><s%> and not die by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> until he stands <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
